articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
Re 吴说获悉，慢雾创始人余弦表示，OpenSea Pro 提示用户启用的 eth_sign 风险性较高。原因是 eth_sign 的盲签内容对于用户来说是完全无法识别其中风险的，钓鱼们(drainers)可以通过这个钓走用户的任意资产，其中包括 ETH 这样的原生资产。
https://twitter.com/evilcos/status/1643410971409670145

Cos(余弦)😶‍🌫️: 喊了那么久，钱包们也努力去屏蔽或默认禁用了 eth_sign 这种原生盲签函数，就是因为 eth_sign 的盲签内容对于用户来说是完全无法识别其中风险的，eth_sign 很强大也很危险，钓鱼们(drainers)可以通过这个钓走你的任意资产，其中包括 ETH 这样的原生资产。
然后，OpenSea Pro 让历史车轮倒退了…🥲

articles.description: 限制比特币矿工利益的 1751 号法案获得德克萨斯州参议院委员会的通过，Satoshi Action Fund 联合创始人 Dennis Porter 认为该法案有超过 95% 的机会获得参议院批准。这项新法案将会限制矿工参与电网辅助服务的比例，取消某些财产的税收减免，并要求具有超过10 MW 计算能力的矿工在德克萨斯电网运营商… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1643416069514862592

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
吴说获悉，MetaMask 宣布在最新版本的扩展中，只要启用自动 NFT 检测，所有 ERC-721 和 1155 代币都会出现。通过此更新，您可以发送 ERC-721 代币，将很快添加发送 ERC-1155 代币的功能。https://twitter.com/MetaMask/status/1643283434771456000

MetaMask 🦊💙: In our latest version of extension, all ERC-721 and 1155 tokens should appear as long as automatic NFT detection is enabled. 
With this update, you can send ERC-721 tokens. We’ll add the ability to send ERC-1155 tokens soon.

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
Here’s what’s wrong with Capo;
- As a trader strong opinions, should be loosely held. 
- Ask yourself what would I need to see to prove me wrong? 
If you don’t define your invalidation, you’re never wrong. 
Do you want to be right or make money? Can’t do both… https://twitter.com/CryptoCapo_/status/1637374540933103617

il Capo Of Crypto: Despite all the noise, I know that the vast majority of those who follow me are genuine and good people. And these deserve an update:
This time away from Twitter has been very good and necessary. I'm totally fine, enjoying my personal life. Thank you to everyone who has shown… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1637374540933103617

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral.
Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m. https://twitter.com/balajis/status/1636797265317867520

Balaji: I will take that bet.
You buy 1 BTC.
I will send $1M USD.
This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k.
The term is 90 days.
All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation.
If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Labor market still tight. Not sure the bond market has this one right.

Guy Berger: 3/ Hiring is still a little elevated relative to what we'd expect given the unemployment rate, but much less than a year ago.  Hires rate is consistent with an unemployment rate ~2.8%.  A year ago, I would have said "consistent with an unemployment rate less than 1%"! https://t.co/1A7VGXvFGS
articles.title: Labor market still tight. Not sure the bond market has this one right.

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Note how Zerohedge’s commentary fails to call out how high above pre pandemic levels the job openings data remains.

zerohedge: With the huge downward revision to Jan JOLTS, the 2-month drop (1.3MM) was the 2nd highest on record, only behind the covid economic collapse. This was at a time when the US was still supposedly creating 300K jobs https://t.co/PQ4O5ncDgM
articles.title: Note how Zerohedge’s commentary fails to call out how high above pre pandemic levels the job openings data remains.

articles.description:
Peak AI?

Mat Roiss - NVDA RocketBear🚀🐻: $NVDA now worth as much as $TSM and $AMD combined. This makes sense because AMD and TSM only have 7x the net income of NVDA with less earnings contraction. 
Also $TSM surely irrelevant for AI.
For everyone that didnt get it last time
🚨🚨🚨 SARCASM ALERT 🚨🚨🚨
